segments.text: How do I submit an expense report ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need all your receipts for reimbursement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean I have to attach the receipts with the expense report ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , here is the form for an expense report . Fill it out and give it to me . I â€™ ll get it signed for you .
segments.speaker: S2
